security: This document contains the names, social security numbers, job titles, and salaries of individuals employed by the House Select Committee on Assassinations. Releasing this information could violate the privacy of these individuals.
summary: This document is a U.S. House of Representatives certification report listing the employees of the Select Committee on Assassinations, their positions, annual salaries, and pay period earnings for the period of November 1, 1978, to November 30, 1978.
summary_one_paragraph: This certification report from the U.S. House of Representatives details the payroll for the Select Committee on Assassinations from November 1 to November 30, 1978. It lists employees' names, social security numbers, job titles, annual gross salaries, and the amount earned during the specified period. Remarks include personnel actions such as pay rate changes, appointments, and terminations, offering a snapshot of the committee's staffing and financial management during this timeframe.
title: Certification Report
